name: Hiragana-Chan
description: Do you like anime and want to start learning Japanese? Then this app is made for you!  Features: - Quiz game that teaches how to read hiragana, katakana, particles , , , and how to figure out the romaji of real Japanese words. - Voice that pronounces the romaji correctly so you dont get it wrong. - Over 500 example words and phrases, with translations. - Kanji + furigana. - Automatic progress-tracking with stars. - Kana chart with everything, even symbols () and obsolete kana. - 1 cute anime girl.
